p: For lacto-ovo-vegetarians, there are some products that are commonly biofortified like dairy and eggs by incorporating fish oil or algal to cows’ and hens’ feed [ 74, 85]. Certainly, the use of algal oil will be preferred to that of fish oil for producing eggs considering the ethics of the vegetarian consumer. Furthermore, from a dietetic point of view, it could be possible to maximize the metabolic conversion from ALA to EPA and DHA by increasing intake of ALA and decreasing intake of LA, hence achieving an optimal balance between omega-3 and omega-6 FAs [ 74].
